Those who already own or plan to purchase the Pro Edition will also benefit from accessing their thematic items, stadiums, balls, etc., in Mirror Edition as well.
The Mirror and Pro versions are linked, the coins earned in both editions are unified, as are the items purchased in either store. That is, if you need coins for an item that you want to buy in the Mirror store, you can also collect coins by playing the various game modes available in the Pro edition.

Features:


  • Intuitive yet challenging gameplay, perfect for all skill levels.
  • Dual control modes cater to both casual and seasoned players.
  • Customizable assistance – turn it on for help or off for a tougher challenge.
  • Realistic soccer elements: fouls, cards, injuries, penalties.

  • Options for women's, men's, and mixed teams.
  • Variety of moves: passes, shots, and specialty skills like Chilean kicks.
  • In-depth team management: formation, strategy, substitutions, and more.



The Mirror Edition promises endless entertainment!
Are you prepared to challenge friends or fight for the title of ultimate champion?

item.title: Apocalypse Love Shelter
item.description:
About This Game

This is a post-apocalyptic adventure/base building game with real actors. You take on the role of a military aficionada who, purely as a hobby, built an entire refugee safehouse. Who would’ve thought that an apocalypse would actually strike? Now, this simple shelter will survive as the first and final line of defense between you and the teeming swarms of zombies.

Game features:

·[Pregame: Prior to the apocalypse arriving, you use your personal cash to build up your shelter and perfect it.]


·[Arrival: Some people who knew of your hobbies, such as a friend, a coworker, or a neighbor all attempt to enter the shelter. You can choose whether to let them in or not.】


·[Shelter Management: Once you’ve built up a team, you need to decide on the best way to allocate food, water, and other resources.]


·[Poor Management: Your team will suffer both physically and mentally if you make poor choices – and they may even fall into the eternal slumber of night.】


·[Night Events: If you don’t have enough food, everyone’s condition will drastically deteriorate, resulting in all sorts of nighttime events.】


·[Affinity & Sidequests: Set your gaze beyond the confines of your shelter. Certain decisions you make in the post-apocalyptic streets will also have a major impact. 】

item.title: SINGULARIUM
item.description:
About This Game

Zoom through levels at mach speeds!

At its very core, SINGULARIUM is a game about speed. It's a Fast-Paced 3D platformer, that has you using the various movement mechanics to their fullest, such as wallrunning, bunny hopping, and your ability to create black holes that pull you around, to try to beat each level with a fast time.

Features:

  • Black Hole Physics - moving while being pulled will allow you to curve around your black hole, adding a ton of complexity and enriching the movement system for those skilled enough to master it.
  • Hardcore Gameplay - Quick reactions will be vital if you want to beat these levels while going at breakneck speeds!
  • Tons of Levels - SINGUALRIUM has 20+ handcrafted levels, with more to come!
  • Level Editor - Create and share your own custom levels!
  • Complex Movement System - combining wallrunning, walljumping, swinging, and bunny hopping will allow you to zoom through the levels
  • Builtin Level Timers - Compare your level times with your friends!

item.title: Number Shoot VR
item.description:
About This Game

Number Shoot VR is a gun shooting VR game that you destroy approaching targets and use the enhancements and weapons you gain to score more points.
The six available weapons have different characteristics, and by using the right weapon you can destroy targets more efficiently.

Play time per session is 4 minutes!
Destroy targets at all costs and aim for a high score!

Destroy Targets!

Shoot targets with your weapon anyway! Destroy as many targets as you can and aim for a high score!
The choice of weapon enhancement is the key to a high score.

Destroy targets, enhance weapons!

Enhancement system is introduced for weapons. Destroying a target will enhance the weapon.
Your Weapon will be enhanced Depending on the color of the destroyed target.
　(Red) Firepower
　(Purple) Rate of fire
　(Blue) Magazine ammunition number
　(Green) accuracy.

Wipe out targets with explosions!

Explosive weapons or black targets (bombs) can collectively damage a target!
but If you destroy a target with a lot of penalty targets ... around it...!

VRM avatar support!

Unity-Chan VRM avatars are available by built-in!
In addition, external VRM avatars can be loaded from a file!

item.title: Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys
item.description:
About This Game

Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.
Your goal is to assemble a picture of cute monkeys that has been cut into an equal number of pieces.
Rotate the pieces to create the full picture, but think logically about the connections and solve the puzzle.
There are 50 levels to complete, and the challenge becomes increasingly difficult as you progress.
Enjoy a relaxing time connecting the pieces to create a beautiful picture of monkeys

In Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys:

•50 levels
•Beautiful art
•Simple controls (mouse)
•Achievements
•Relaxing music

item.title: Clean City Project
item.description:
About This Game

Collect, shoot, destroy and collect again.
This is a decontamination shooter game that you can play without worrying about time.

An experimental city floating on the sea has suddenly turned purple due to a pollution accident.
The player takes on the role of Lavilitta, a rabbit-shaped cleaning robot,
Can you clean up the polluted city and restore the beautiful white city?

The player has two objectives

Fill all 8 purification facilities with scattered "energy gems".
To remove all pollution.


To strengthen the player with the batteries found in each location,
and collect and remove them more efficiently!

The Story

A pollution accident has occurred in the experimental city of Alpha.
A large amount of dangerous purple pollutants have been generated and have covered the city.
All residents appear to have been safely evacuated.
In order to restore the city, it is necessary to recover the energy scattered throughout the city and fill all eight purification facilities.
However, the facilities have been shut down and the damage will only continue to grow.
To solve this problem, the cleaning robot "Lavilitta" was dispatched to remove the contaminants.
It is equipped with a vacuum cleaner with powerful suction and a special filter.
And it should be able to destroy contamination by sending energy bullets.
To reclaim the city, Lavilitta is going to work!

item.title: PRIN-C1
item.description:
About This Game

An Endless runner with a twist! Play as a dog named PRIN-C1 who can walk, trot and run but cannot stop.

Go Slow. Go Fast. Speed is your choice


Switch views seamlessly


Collect treats. If not.. steal them


Smash them or get punched


Unlock fun costumes by completing score challenges

item.title: Living With Sister: Monochrome Fantasy
item.description:
About This Game




Living in a fantasy world, it's always been your dream to grow up to be a famous adventurer just like your father. Reality proves to be more boring than fiction, however, as your days are mostly spent doing odd jobs for the villagers. With your friends by your side, you enter the Tournament of the Eights and strive for something greater: the chance to become the top guild in the country. Will you realize your ambitions, or will your hopes slip through your fingers and doom you to a life of monochrome monotony?


As a member of your town's Adventurers' Guild, it's your job to protect the townsfolk. Go on hunts, kill dangerous beasts, and hone your abilities to better tackle whatever challenges tomorrow brings.

Once you get home from work, you'll have your sister to attend to. She's a very sickly girl who needs a lot of help. Manage your household finances well, build up your relationship with your sister, and who knows, perhaps you might even be able to solve the mystery behind her illness.











Hand-Drawn Monochrome Art
Though it may lack color, this game's world is anything but colorless! The stunning black-and-white art is chock-full of personality and is sure to leave you with plenty of marvelous monochrome memories!

Unique Combat System
With tons of bizarre and ferocious monsters to fight and dozens of unique skills to unlock, your adventures are sure to be full of challenge and excitement!

Charming Characters
Build up your relationships with your guildmates and your sister to learn about what makes them tick and unlock character-specific abilities to further assist you in your quest to become the top guild in the country!

item.title: Part of You
item.description:
About This Game

Well shucks, you’ve lost your identity! It’s somewhere in Hacksaw Springs, and everything is pointing you toward the Lost and Found inside… a… Clown Convention?

Tools

In Part of You, you will have to use a variety of tools in order to solve problems around Hacksaw Springs. Some of the tools you’ll be using include:

  • The Flipper: The flipper will turn any facial feature upside down. Need somebody to look away? Turn their frown upside down? Make someone look a little goofy, generally speaking? The flipper is for you!

  • The Stamp: Ever needed someone to have a different person’s mouth? Eyes? … you have? Huh, that’s weird. With the stamp, you can clone facial features and put them onto other people! Want to make someone look like someone else? Make Millard Morawn a chad? Make a clone army? The stamp has you covered!

  • The Mask: Missing your own identity? No problem – just steal someone else’s! Fraud isn’t real, and nobody will come after you. It may not be the best disguise, but… people love talking to familiar faces.

  • Googly Eyes: Have you ever taken a pair of googly eyes and put them on your eyelids, trying to balance them and pretend they’re your own eyes? Now you can forcibly stick them onto someone else’s eyes!

    Hacksaw Springs


    Hacksaw Springs is usually a bit of a snoozefest – your average town, your average drama. Now that Funny Business is renting out the convention center for Clown Around 20XX, things have been pretty hectic! The Flea Market is as busy as ever, with new stalls popping up. The Parking Lot is filled with pop-up shops and protests. To top it all off, the incompetent town security is more preoccupied with googly eyes than A BOMB!

    Characters

    Over 100 unique characters fill the streets (and roofs?) of Hacksaw Springs. Help out the friendly townsfolk, and they might just help you in return! A dedicated employee of a three-years-defunct video store, a noseless mechanic in love with his goil, a tumbleweed with a warrant? All that and more as you rediscover who you are…

    Need a Little Funny HaHa?

    The more you play, the more characters you’ll gain access to! Have a field day making the funniest faces Hacksaw Springs has to offer!

    Finding your Identity

    Part of You is all about finding your identity, as well as us finding ours. This is a game about the absurdity of the world and the silliness we all face every morning when we look at ourselves in the mirror. Part of You and Hacksaw Springs welcomes you, no matter who you are… as long as you don’t have coulrophobia.

item.title: REDACTED
item.description:
About This Game

REDACTED is an action-packed zombie survival game with an emphasis on narrative, unique gameplay experiences, and atmosphere. Anything not nailed down can be used to your advantage as you survive against the zombie horde in this mysterious facility. Check out the merchant to stock up on supplies or buy new weapons. Survive for as long as you can against increasingly difficult waves of undead in survival mode. Try out onslaught mode if you want to test yourself against the ultimate challenge.

item.title: Snip It!
item.description:
About This Game

Snip It! is a line-drawing arcade puzzle game inspired by games like Qix. Your goal is to capture parts of the canvas by drawing shapes and avoiding the enemies. Complete all 25 levels to win!

Controls: WASD/arrow keys or click/touch to navigate & move, ESC to pause, M to mute.

item.title: Essence Bloom
item.description:
About This Game

"I will show you a path to happiness."

Essence Bloom is a linear story-focused Visual Novel that is centered around the MC (the player) living in a peaceful world where he spends time with friends:

Hikari - Aka, "The Sunshine Girl," is always smiling and happy. In fact, she seems obsessed with it and wants everyone else to be as happy as she is.

Yuna - She runs the coffee shop, is number one in her class, and still finds time to take care of her younger sister, Saeko. She's bossy and blunt, but she has a gentle heart deep down.

Saeko - She is the opposite of her older sister, Yuna, in almost every way. She's clumsy, timid, and very reliant. She also seems confused most of the time and worries everyone, but she is well loved. 

Kagome - She's a well-disciplined martial arts champion who will defend anyone she cares about, no matter the sacrifice. She can also, surprisingly, be a bit bashful.

The friends spend their time in school studying, working at their local coffee shop, and doing fun activities. Everything is peaceful until things start to happen that threaten the serenity of this world...

Features: A story-rich experience with aesthetic visuals, energetic characters, and ~4 hours of dialogue. 

This game is meant for 18+ audiences. Some viewers may find the content disturbing or offensive.

item.title: [Chilla's Art] Shinkansen 0 | 新幹線 0号
item.description:
About This Game

Shinkansen 0 | 新幹線 0号 is a game set in Japan where players are tasked with finding anomalies in the Shinkansen. (Japanese bullet train)

Supporter content can be turned on and off at the title screen. (It is on by default)

Motion Blur and Headbob is turned off by default.

Controls:

WASD - Move
Left Click - Interact　
Right Click - Zoom
Shift - Run
ESC - Options

Easy mode - There is an easy mode in the mainmenu available for everyone to enjoy

Auto-save: auto-save for each chapter

Endings: There are two endings

If you encounter any technical issues, do the following:

-Update GPU driver
-Lower the Graphics settings/Screen resolution
-Update Windows OS
-Check if your anti-virus software is blocking the game or its save data. (Save Data location: C:\Users\[YOURUSERNAME]\AppData\LocalLow\Chilla's Art, LLC\Shinkansen0)
-Delete save, then try again (Save Data location: C:\Users\[YOURUSERNAME]\AppData\LocalLow\Chilla's Art, LLC\Shinkansen0)
-Check if your PC meets the system requirements

item.title: The Thief, the Witch, the Toad, and the Mushroom.
item.description:
About This Game

You're curled up in front of the fire reading a folk tale on a cold winter's night. Something about it seems so familiar. Have you read this before?



  • Explore a cosy and mysterious fantasy universe inspired by fairy tales. The old kind of fairy tales, strange and wild, before the edges were sanded off. Warm and comforting, but with parts you don't quite understand, and you don't know if you want to understand.

  • Befriend strange and wonderful folks. Navigate 4 main routes through the game as you grow closer to the main characters.

  • Align yourself with G-d, Death, or the Devil. Choose your godparent and your destiny.

  • Uncover secrets and mysteries. Something strange haunts this book. What was that shape? At the corner of your vision?

  • Multiple endings. So, so many endings. I cannot be stopped.

item.title: Pearl Fishery: Quest for the Mega Pearl
item.description:
About This Game

Q. What kind of game is this?

A. In this game, you can shoot pearls to gather treasure under the mysterious Pearl Island and fire harpoons to fight off dangerous sea creatures.

Pearls can score bonuses, or they can trigger Party Time for even more rewards.
You can earn new badges and titles!

Shoot Pearls
Under an island where pearls are plentiful and sea creatures roam, you control a pearl shooter that will lead you to riches...and danger.



Bonus Blocks
Pearls can activate bonus blocks—providing you with extra pearls and gold.
You can even get big pearls!



Party Time
Want to party under the sea? Trigger five of the same bonus block.
You will be rewarded with a pearl waterfall and a light show.



Big Pearl Bonus
Some pearls are very big. They can be collected and exchanged for a lot of gold.
How much gold? Luck will decide.



Earn Gold
Push pearls off the platform to get gold. It's time to make a fortune.



Get Treasure
Need a place to store your gold? Put them in treasure chests and collect as many as you can.



Badges & Titles
With enough treasure chests, you can level up. You will get a shiny new badge.
And a cool new title to go with it.



Sunken Pirates
Even as ghosts, pirates want to loot your treasure. They will take what you have, but you can send them back to the depths!



Giant Crab
Sea monsters live in treacherous waters. Fight back and defeat the Giant Crab!
It'll lead you straight to The Mega Pearl.



The Mega Pearl
The biggest pearl of them all was rumored to be deep under Pearl Island.
No adventurer, pirate, or merchant has found it...yet.

item.title: THERE'S NO EASY WAYOUT 99
item.description:
About This Game

well, this is my second professional game. fortunately or unfortunately made completely alone again AND again by just one person a classic indie game . Tells a Story ... A little robot gains the opportunity from the Creator of God's Multiverse to experience human life led by Francis Bacon and Zyzz . will experience all the pros and cons of your lifetime on Earth . Legendary and unforgettable adventures that pay homage to the extraordinary passage of Francis Bacon and Zyzz on planet earth. Helping the little robot to live here on Earth .



MANY FEATURES THERE'S NO EASY WAYOUT 99 DOCUMENTAL MAIN MENU :


3 AMAZING CHARACTERS TO CHOOSE THEM AS THE GENIUSES FRANCIS BACON, ZYZZ AND LITTLE ROBOT !!!


20 DIFFERENT TYPE OF ENEMIES WITH DIFFERENT STYLES AND DIFFERENT LEVELS OF POWER " HARDER " .


4 BIG BOSSESS ASAN ANTICHRIST ASHOKA'S HELL, ÁTILA o Huno, PRINCESS AND LION'S ALPHA.

TOGGLE CAMERAS VIEWS FIRSTPERSONSHOOTER, THIRDPERSONCLOSER, TOPDOWN VIEW AND PRESS F TO CHANGE THE TYPE OF VIEWS .

11 DIFFERENT AMAZING DARKER AND LIGHTER LEVELS( HurricaneS) COSMOS POSSIBLE OPEN WORLDS .

THIS PROJECT CALLED THERE'S NO EASY WAYOUT 99 WAS MADE IN UNREAL ENGINE 4 YET .
USING C++ CODETIME .


STYLE OF PLAY : RPG STRATEGY GAMES .. AS DARKSOULS .... HARDER AGAIN HAHAHA !!!


" INSPIRED BY the Gnome is TOO AWARE (WAYNERADIOTV) OF COURSE " LESSER AWARENESS " AND GENIUS VS ANTICHRIST 1 BUT EASIER !!! "

item.title: RestorArt: Fairwood Hills Collector's Edition
item.description:
About This Game

RestorArt: Fairwood Hills is an enchanting art restoration journey in the tranquil town of Fairwood Hills. Entrusted by the town with their beloved yet impaired artworks, from scorched natural scenes captured in photographs to fragmented paintings, your mission is to revive these artifacts to their former splendor.

RestorArt: Fairwood Hills veers from the traditional path of jigsaw puzzles by offering a distinctive gameplay twist. Players are tasked with matching unique pieces on a canvas, enhancing both the challenge and engagement of the game.

Key Features:
  • Five innovative game modes
  • More than 90 carefully crafted levels
  • Collector's Edition content: 24 bonus levels, music player, certificates, and more...

This game seamlessly marries the tranquility of puzzle-solving with the joy of art restoration. Each mode introduces a fresh challenge, from piecing together the intricate details that restore the artwork's original allure to assembling a collection of beautiful stickers.

item.title: Solar System Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

In this game you can explore almost any moon or planet of our solar system and visit remarkable nearby stars and see their location in the Milky Way. But you can also change existing bodies or add new ones and make a solar system of your own. The simulation will then act as a gravity and physics sandbox and recalculate orbits in line with Newton's laws.

This is the desktop version of the mobile game "Solar System Simulator", which on mobile has so far accumulated about 800.000 downloads. This desktop version offers higher quality texture and height maps and smoother gameplay. More features will be added to the game.

item.title: Machick
item.description:
About This Game



Fight against the highly armed army of anti-magic frogs and restore peace in the forest before it's destroyed! "Machick" is a casual game that offers a unique experience where you are the last hope. Using ancient crafting and materials acquired from the wizardry shop, build amazing magic wands with various effects and powers. During the combat phase, face hordes of enemies, accumulate experience, and choose strategic upgrades to progress further in the challenging journey and gather resources to get even closer to your goal.




- Players shape their journey by constructing their wand with items acquired in the store.
- Strategically choose wand components to optimize performance during combat.
- Puzzle challenges that test the player's creativity in crafting magical wands.





- Confront the army of anti-magic toads in epic and challenging battles.
- Employ your newly crafted wands to defeat enemies and advance the storyline.
- Develop unique combat skills as you progress, facing increasingly formidable creatures.

item.title: Kill Invaders
item.description:
About This Game

Kill Invaders


Explore an exciting multiplayer world in the FPS style that has been in development for about a year. In this version, dive into the multiplayer deathmatch mode, with a captivating narrative unfolding.

Get ready for an intriguing plot in the story mode, where aliens are planning to invade Earth and our secret space base. It all began when scientists, in an attempt to create dark matter in a laboratory, inadvertently drew the attention of extraterrestrial criminal factions to our planet. The previously unknown spatial address became visible, triggering an imminent threat.

We hope you have an amazing experience playing! If you're a fan of first-person shooter games, you'll undoubtedly appreciate the unique gameplay of Kill Invaders. We are using the latest Photon server technology with movement prediction to ensure a lag-free experience. While lag is common in many games, this technology promises to significantly enhance your enjoyment in Kill Invaders!

item.title: Milky Way TD SURVIVORS AUTOBATTLER RTS: Earth
item.description:
About This Game

Milky Way is a mix of Tower Defense, RTS, Auto-Battler and Survivors genres. Visit planets in the Milky Way Galaxy and protect them against hordes of enemies.
Milky Way: Earth is a demo version of the game, where 1 of 4 maps, 9 of 11 towers and 3 of 5 skills are available.

BUILD YOUR BASE


Develop your economy: gather stone with mines and gold with furnaces.
Strengthen your defenses: use collected resources to build towers to fight off the enemies.
Towers are divided into two types: some of them summon units, while others attack enemies. Some of the summoned units are perfect in order to distract enemies against themselves and protect other towers. Remember that the good placement of the towers is the key to victory.

USE SKILLS


Gather mana with pylons and spend it on powerfull skills. You can summon a giant meteor, shoot with orbital gun or unleash a starfall on your enemies. Use everything to win!

SURVIVE!


There're over 40 types of enemies in the game, some of them have dangerous abilities. Can you survive against all of them?

FEATURES

  • Dynamic and engaging gameplay
  • A variety of gameplay styles
  • 11 towers with their own abilities
  • 4 maps with unique atmosphere
  • Multitude of upgrades to choose from

item.title: 冒险小子 Adventure boy
item.description:
About This Game

Adventure Boy is a pixel style 2D board adventure game. The character will automatically move and attack enemies, and skills need to be manually cast. Career transfer provides career weapons and skills, but players can only choose one at a time. Upgrade to obtain random character values and skills, and combine them with different weapons and skills to create your own professional genre. In addition, there are ways to enhance combat effectiveness such as contracts, fruits, and gift boxes.



Role upgrade



According to the level increase of the character, a random bonus to the character's numerical value and the acquisition of ordinary skills will be provided. Players can choose appropriate values and skills based on the genre they want to create.



Ordinary skills



Ordinary skills are divided into upgradeable skills and non upgradeable skills. The maximum carrying capacity of non upgradeable skills is 2, and the maximum carrying capacity of upgradeable skills is 5. Upgradable skills can be upgraded up to 5 levels, and after 5 levels, the skills undergo a qualitative change with an additional entry. From low to high, there is a higher chance of achieving higher quality in white, green, and blue.



Role transfer



Reaching a certain level allows for job transfer, with main professions being Warrior, Sagittarius, and Mage. There are two stages of job transfer, each time providing the professional weapons and skills of the profession. Only one can be selected for each job transfer, and completing the entire profession can be achieved through repeated job transfers.



Other content



Contract: Players can choose to sign a powerful contract after passing the secret realm level, but the contract also comes with side effects.



Gift Box: There will be a gift box with a number in the upper right corner of the interface, which represents the probability of successfully opening the gift box. If you think you're lucky, you can try clicking on the gift box at around 30%. Otherwise, it's better to be honest and achieve 100%



Fruit: When you successfully open the gift box, you can choose the fruit reward, which provides you with character attribute bonuses and can be stacked infinitely. Fruits can also be obtained from completing levels and stored in your backpack before your adventure.

item.title: Aurans
item.description:
About This Game

"You have been chosen to shoulder heavy burdens and great powers. You will be granted an exceptional chance, Rowan Alanna Nightingale."

When homely nobody Rowan Nightingale gets hit by a car, she doesn't die, but instead is chosen to become an Auran - a being who can make anything happen, on three conditions: she has to be able to imagine it, believe it, and then create it. Taken under her mentor's wing, she travels to other dimensions and learns to harness the power of her imagination, slowly growing more confident in herself. But dark forces are lurking in the shadows, and who better to manipulate than a young, naïve Auran such as her? Soon, Rowan must fight her inner demons - quite literally - in order to save the dimensions from being destroyed. But can you truly believe that you are stronger than the darkest, most evil force in the entire multiverse, when all your life you have believed you weren't worth anything at all?

Aurans is a kinetic visual novel, meaning it is linear and with no choices. It is a story about coming of age, learning to believe in yourself, and finding out what really matters to you. Everything is fully hand drawn, and is the first visual novel project of Pixelsplosion Studios.

item.title: Story of Mine Company
item.description:
About This Game

Hire miners

You can hire miner for 1 day, or if you have enough lodging space, you can buy his debts.

Hired miners will work for you for 1 day and then leave. Also, they only get paid at the end of the day unless they have a fatal accident.
Miners-debtors will work for you forever, so you only have to pay for provisions. You will also receive 2 additional inventory cells since, after work, they return to the base with you.

Try to control the chaos of the workflow

In the process of extracting resources, various ridiculous situations arise since the behavior of the miners is unpredictable and sometimes stupid. They can start smoking next to nitrate blocks or start digging a block that has other miners on it. At the same time, blocks under which there is no support or other blocks can collapse with some chance, breaking all buildings under them. The player will have to respond in time to a constantly changing situation.

Trade in the market

Prices in the game are volatile. Store resources in storage and sell them at profitable prices.

Improve your buildings

Lodging - increases the max number of miners-debtors.
Storage - allows you to store items until better days.
Cargo - allows you to carry more items with you.
Workshop - allows you to craft items.

Control

Player mode - Action1 set target. Action2 pick up item.
Building mode - Action1 buid. Action2 destroy. Action3 quick destroy (middle mouse by default).

item.title: TekSkeleton
item.description:
About This Game



TekSkeleton this is a hardcore 2D platformer with 5 hand-crafted levels wrapped in atmospheric retro dungeon-style graphics. This is the debut game of the Tek line games.

Features!
  • Spirit of retro games
  • Stylish dungeon theme
  • Linear progression of levels
  • 5 difficult handmade levels
  • Convenient and sensitive control
  • Automatic level restart after loss

item.title: Desert Witch
item.description:
About This Game

When using a sniper rifle, you eliminate enemies at long distances, although sometimes you have to fight at close range, then you can use a short weapon.
The action takes place in an open world, in a desert area filled with numerous buildings that the player can use to hide or attack.
The game consists of 15 missions in which the player's task is to eliminate a specific person or several depending on the mission.
Completed missions can be repeated in any order.
The target is also a moving car or a building that needs to be blown up.
The notebook contains maps, mission description, information on how to find the target, and a calculator that helps you properly set the telescope, taking into account the distance to the target, wind strength and direction.
In the game, we look from a third-person view from behind. The view changes to first-person FPS when we observe the area through a building window or through a telescope.
Looking through the telescope, we can turn on the image from the camera tracking the bullet's flight in real time, which is useful at long distances when the bullet's flight lasts several seconds and the target is less visible.
The bullet's flight is reproduced in accordance with reality, taking into account gravity, side wind and decreasing speed with distance.
It happens that shots are fired at a distance of over 2 km, the game area is approximately 3x3 km, it is a desert with four built-up districts.
Generally, our opponent is a group of bandits who want to take control of the newly created city, the player's task is to eliminate them from the occupied area.

item.title: Gore Doctor
item.description:
About This Game





Gore Doctor is an immersive horror game set to unleash spine-chilling thrills on PC. You find yourself in the institute of a tormented doctor who, driven by desperation, defies ethical boundaries to save his wife, Scarlett, from a deadly illness. As Scarlett succumbs to her fate, the doctor descends into madness and becomes convinced that death is the only respite. Players must navigate the nightmarish corridors of the doctor’s institute, confronting grotesque horrors, uncovering dark secrets, and striving to escape with their lives intact. Can you survive the twisted labyrinth and unravel the haunting mysteries within?



Your journey begins within the decrepit and foreboding walls of the doctor's institute, a place once dedicated to healing but now consumed by malevolence and despair. Each step you take into the dimly lit corridors leads you deeper into a world of grotesque horrors, twisted experiments, and unspeakable terror. The atmosphere is thick with dread, and every creaking floorboard and distant moan only serves to heighten your anxiety.




As you navigate the labyrinthine halls, you'll encounter grotesque abominations, born from the doctor's relentless pursuit of knowledge and power. These nightmarish creatures will stop at nothing to protect the doctor's secrets, and you must summon every ounce of courage to survive their relentless pursuit. The vivid and disturbing visuals will sear into your mind, leaving an indelible mark long after you've escaped the clutches of this nightmare.



But survival alone is not enough. To truly understand the horrors that have unfolded within these walls, you must uncover the dark secrets that fester beneath the surface. Through journal entries, scattered documents, and hidden artifacts, you'll piece together the doctor's descent into madness and the terrible consequences of his actions. The truth you unearth will challenge your very perception of right and wrong, blurring the line between savior and monster.

Gore Doctor is not for the faint of heart. It is a game that revels in the grotesque, pushing the boundaries of horror and gore to create an experience that will leave you breathless and disturbed. Brace yourself for a psychological rollercoaster ride, where your every nerve will be tested, and your darkest fears will be unleashed. Only the strongest will emerge from the doctor's institute with their sanity intact, but be warned, the price of survival may be higher than you can imagine.



Enter at your own risk, for once you step into the twisted world of Gore Doctor, there may be no escape from its clutches.

item.title: Labyrinth of Rage
item.description:
About This Game

A Souls-Like game like nothing seen before


Trapped inside a Labyrinth constructed inside a demonic realm, our hero must face the deepest and darkest depths inside these twisted walls. Imbued with the power of magic, combat, and archery.

Will you escape the Labyrinth?


Fight your way against hordes of monsters while traversing through the twisted hallways.

Various Combat Styles


Use different styles of combat like one-handed sword & shield, bow & arrows, and magic! With many more combat styles on the way.

Level up through Gear!


Become stronger by wandering through the labyrinth and acquiring new weapons and armor.

Many updates on the way (Early Access)


This game is still in it's infancy and will continue to grow, for the time being it is in Early Access right now.
